Linux.name: grep without regexp
Linux.data:
-F --fixed-strings flag - will search exact match:
grep -F 'some[]strange$string'
also works in ag

Linux.name: ssh tunnel port example
Linux.data:
ssh vagrant@192.168.99.105 -L 5433:127.0.0.1:5432 -N 
-L remote_port:localhost:local_port 
 -N      Do not execute a remote command.  This is useful for just forwarding ports

DB.name: postgres select data as json
DB.data:
select data as json: use to_json():
 select to_json(binbase) from binbase where id = 3106249;
